channel.title: Peekture Gallery on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in Peekture Gallery on Yaya's World

item.title: Commissions
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I do commissions! For more information on commissioning me, you can check out the page about commissions. Please note that I only showcase commissions that the original client has given me permission to showcase!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Wallpapers
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
This is a collection of some of my favorite wallpapers. I like vector art and I like wallpapers that aren’t too busy. If you like those things too, then maybe you should download some of these…or not…up to you ðŸ˜œ.

I do not own any of these wallpapers. If I have information on who created it, that information is in the caption! Also for basically all of autumn last year I rocked a very dark theme on all of my devices. This was the Dracrula Theme it was a really cool theme and the macOS wallpaper (there are other versions, check out the site!) for it is included below!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Yaya's Creations
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I draw too! That’s right I don’t just play games, but I also like to draw. I will even stream my art, you can check out my past art streams on YouTube. I try to do at least one art stream a week, so please check it out, and check out my finished works below!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Wall o' ADVENTURE
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Oh boi! I’m not really sure what to do with this one. The original plan was to have screenshots of the ADVENTURES I’ve had in past games, but, with clips on Twitch and my YouTube Archives I’m not really sure any more. I haven’t updated it in ages ðŸ˜… Right now its just a random set of screenshots from one MMO I used to play. Maybe it’ll showcase ADVENTURES I have with kittens? I don’t know yet, thanks for looking though ðŸ˜…
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
